author: mxmanghi
msg: * rivet/packages/tclrivet/tclrivetparser.tcl: Tcl parser implements new shorthand echo syntax (closes bug #53217)
* doc/xml/entities.xml: New manual page for package RivetEntities
* rivet/packages/form/form.tcl: indentation converted to spaces to improve editing across different
editors. Fixed problem with variable clash in constructor. Also removed unneeded [expr ...] in conditions
* doc/xml/commands.xml: improved manual entry for 'var list' (Fixes bug #52911)

msg: HIVE-3018 Make the new header for RC Files introduced in HIVE-2711 optional

msg: Added static import-package declerations to handle deserialization problems in an OSGI

msg: Added external import declarations for handling deserialization problems
